metadata.description: The Magus is said by many to be immortal and the secrets are revealed as to how he obtained this immortality. There was a heavy price to pay for that immortality and now, the evil Beelzebub, the Lord of the Flies has come to collect. Will Magus sacrifice his only daughter Lilith to this master of the darkness? And when Lilith attempts to save herself, and her mind that was composed of the memories of the dead but is suddenly wiped clean, can she now search within herself for her true nature. Drawn by X-Men’s Craig Brafield and written by awarding author Gary Reed.
metadata.name: Magus
